documents.document: Sure @MattyWinspit - please just provide us with an email address. Unfortunately it is unlikely that there will be cancellations.
Sorry @MattyWinspit, we have no availability over those dates.
Sorry @keentoride, we don't have guest laundry facilities, only drycleaning options.

We are 100% operational and ready to welcome guests. View Press Release: https://t.co/2Lzqv0hR6R #wellington #eqnz #hospitality
For updates regarding the earthquake and travel information, visit Wellington Councils Crisis Management page: https://t.co/GbywmmEJgj
Earthquake Update: If you have an upcoming stay, please contact the hotel directly on 04 499 9500 for further information.
The Hotel has been given the all clear from the structural engineer and is operational. Thankfully all guests and staff are safe and well.

Congratulations to our finalists Denise Thornton, Kamlesh Kumar, Stephanie Bickers and Sarah Croskery! https://t.co/WfOIxUht9f
It's almost #EarthHour in NZ. We have asked our guests to participate and the hotel will reduce lighting in public areas at 8.30pm.
Our Hotel Restaurant is currently featuring on GrabOne, with Buffet Lunch for $24. Deal ends Sunday so get in quick! https://t.co/0VJTcqdzul

Enjoy summer in the Capital with our Sweet Summer Saver package. From $189.00 per night. https://t.co/c4r6xOMg9g https://t.co/OZ6pzSdqWd

@WellingtonZoo Congratulations, what a great achievement!
It's beginning to look a lot like #Christmas in our hotel lobby! #gingerbreadhouse #nomnomnom https://t.co/asS4judrcC
Come get your strawberries and ice cream today at Midland Park and support #marypotterhospice #nomnomnom https://t.co/Bdp5RMYZ6X

It's GIVEAWAY time! We have 1x DOUBLE PASS TO GIVEAWAY to 'Magicians: In the Capital'. Click here for details http://t.co/78vvkMRkjN
Jan 30 & 31 sees the superheroes of World Rugby go head to head at the #SevensWelly. Grab your tickets now! http://t.co/78ZslXjfgL
@BritInWgtn Hi Annalie, Sorry for the confusion. Your booking has been moved to Whitby's. Our team will be in touch shortly to confirm :)
We are proud to support #loudshirtday2015. For more info and to donate visit http://t.co/KBvWCCDif9. http://t.co/O9c0FWetQn
We have gone green at #ShowMeWgtn. Pop down to our stand at the TSB Bank Arena and enjoy some choc mint bliss balls! http://t.co/7E4kCVRdfF
You know what they say, you can't beat Wellington on a good day! #springisonitsway #wellingtonnz http://t.co/MSxAfk0h4V
Our in-house spa, Infuse Spa, have a special offer for the month of August. Get in quick as spaces are filling up :) http://t.co/vvfW9I86eb
@devlincolle Thanks for the mention! Here is a photo showcasing the eco-couture dress & some of our best dressed team http://t.co/GgNq1TTxT0
Today on @GrabOneWGTN you can grab a two person Wgtn escape including late checkout & parking for $119 per night! #WeekendGetaway #TGIF
Today marks the start of #Matariki, the Māori New Year; a time to reflect on the past and celebrate the new. Happy Matariki everyone!
Our chefs are cooking up a storm for the #Pasifika Food festival which starts tonight in Whitby's Restaurant! #nomnom http://t.co/cQH4XJ8fEH
@setatameifuna Glad you had a great time at our Whitby's buffet! :)
@Tattoogolf_NZ Hi, In order to get our best rates for Aug 8, please email our team on reservations@jamescookhotel.co.nz :)
Support us in #JunkFreeJune where we are giving up junk food to support the Cancer Society. http://t.co/LSPjAkq7cs http://t.co/c1AGLkq7QA
We are proud to announce that we have been named a finalist in the 2015 @GoldAwards, under the Green Gold Category! http://t.co/PqoDlhoQ4D
Some of our staff members are outside the James Cook arcade today collecting for the #MaryPotterHospice Street Collection. Come say hi!
Happy Friday! Hope all Mother's have a lovely Sunday and get to relax and put your feet up! Enjoy #TGIF #MothersDay http://t.co/NM0I89EWcA
Enter our Mother's Day Facebook #giveaway & you could #win a 3 course dinner for 2 at Whitby’s Restaurant. http://t.co/vmEG0FfJ8t
@MarcusDCook We hope you have a pleasant stay with us!
@MarcusDCook Hi, it's about 10-15 minutes (about 1km) walk from James Cook Hotel. We look forward to welcoming you soon.
@beekaynz We offer valet parking for $29 per day so no need to book a car park.
@spillow Hi Bronwyn! We are happy to hear that you had a great dinner at Whitby's. Look forward to welcoming you back again soon.
To celebrate the start of our Easter High Tea we have a voucher for 2 to #giveaway.Enter here: http://t.co/78vvkMRkjN http://t.co/lKeyjuqcWF
Shaun Johnson, the hotel's blind resident pianist, nears 35 years of service to the hotel! http://t.co/pBGk6wF1JR
We are proud to announce that we have achieved gold certification by #EarthCheck & #Qualmark! http://t.co/DIsP8qZ97D http://t.co/8qr0Ws0Xjw
Happy Chinese New Year! Wishing you luck and prosperity in the Year of the Sheep. #ChineseNewYear http://t.co/eLv1r61uys
#DidYouKnow that the @SevensWelly teams go through over 14,400 eggs during their stay! #SevensWelly http://t.co/9T2ouhla0z
#DidYouKnow for the past 15 years, the James Cook Hotel has been the #homeawayfromhome for all #SevensWelly teams http://t.co/iKLyaRvDx5
Wanna #WIN tickets to @SevensWelly? It's your last chance today http://t.co/h9AO20w0fm http://t.co/oEbjXUf0qW http://t.co/EjNuJiF6TB

@nz7s We look forward to welcoming the team to the hotel! #teamallblacks #nz7s #homeawayfromhome
The Tyrannosaurs are about to be extinct...again! The last day for @Te_Papa's #Tyrannosaurs exhibition is 8 Feb: http://t.co/jz3nrh3BJ9
For your chance to #WIN tickets to @SevensWelly head on over to our Facebook page http://t.co/EGBksodw9f http://t.co/oEbjXUf0qW
Only 2 weeks until @SevensWelly!We are looking forward to welcoming the teams back to the hotel! http://t.co/QoGcNXcQGo
RT @WildBayNZ: Wellington's pop up village now on along the waterfront. Wed to Sun until Easter. #WhyWellington http://t.co/DqvXcWstXL
It’s the perfect day for a stroll around #Wellington. Feeling active? Visit @fergskayaks & kayak around the harbour! http://t.co/V6W4ZNfZgG
@BlitzBokke We are looking forward to hosting all of the teams again this year. Not long to go now! :)
On behalf of the team at James Cook Hotel we would like to wish you a safe & happy Christmas & a prosperous new year! http://t.co/pb6vn6KRsA
@WanderlustRehab No problem. Enjoy your time in Wellington and do see our front office team if you need any assistance during your stay.
@WanderlustRehab Hi Paul, check in is 2pm. However, you are more than welcome to leave your luggage with concierge until your room is ready
@LosaHopoi Glad to hear you loved the Whitby's buffet. It makes it even better when someone else is paying :) Have a great weekend!
@WanderlustRehab Hi Paul, We look forward to welcoming you to the hotel next week. Have a great weekend :)
Join in the hunt for more than 20 Hobbit costumes placed throughout #Wellington. #TheHobbit http://t.co/gDM7DiYttA http://t.co/MjUdX05Jbv
@Freshsounz Glad to hear you had a great stay. See you next time! Enjoy the long weekend :)
Today on @Grab_One it's only $45 for 2 to enjoy our new high tea, infused with the flavours of our organic tea range. http://t.co/AMP6U3Uu1z
@Freshsounz Looking forward to welcoming you to the hotel. Hope you have an enjoyable stay with us :)
Are you on Instagram? We are! Follow us @jamescookwellington and enter our comp to be in to WIN a pamper prize pack! http://t.co/1EcjDvAJul
It's #giveaway time! Are you on Instagram? We are! Follow us @jamescookwellington and enter our comp to be in to WIN! http://t.co/ZTWZEkGaQL
@WhyWellington Amazing food, fabulous shopping & art galleries, thriving nightlife, with everything you need within walking distance!
Good morning #Wellington. You're looking mighty fine today! http://t.co/DgyaJ3aKvy
Make the most of your #WOW experience and treat yourself to one of our luscious cocktails in Sojourn Café. #WOWinWLG http://t.co/zTEoEGp2Hw
Sojourn Café is proud to serve great tasting organic, fair trade Piazza D'Oro coffee! Pop in to get your daily fix. http://t.co/qNZJeWNudG
Celebrate the vibrant Mexican culture & cuisine at our Mexican Food Festival. 24 - 28 Sept. http://t.co/4fOJgUL0Ug http://t.co/rvHoStTo9X
Rise and shine at Sojourn Café. Now open for #breakfast on Saturday & Sunday's 7:00am - 10:30am over September. http://t.co/R9adh3Avry
Celebrate Dad this Father’s Day with a buffet at Whitby's & be in to #win a craft beer pack! http://t.co/zWg9uLly0B http://t.co/F5Va6w1wSu
Our team are proud to support the Cancer Society #DaffodilDay. Show your support & get your daffodils today. http://t.co/4TXDSNwFPg
@yando We hope you have a great stay with us! Please let us know if we can be of any assistance :)
Need some pampering? Head on over to our Facebook Page to be in to #WIN a $100 Ella Baché spa voucher. https://t.co/AOhpSJu3Fc
Make sure you head on down to the #wgtnlux Festival, running from 6-11pm until the 31 Aug. http://t.co/lvHyut7Xc6 http://t.co/S4Bz5Ex7dV
Ever tried venison & orange together? You can from 2mrw @ Sojourn Café as part of @WellyOnaPlate #burgerwelly #nomnom http://t.co/AJG4R5zQsa
Thanks #TopNewFollowers @photo_byWoolf @Shop_Tours @WellyWineFood Happy to connect :)
@HTVAuckland Thank you! We are so thrilled to have been named a finalist :)
Our @wellyonaplate dish of the day: Coq au Vin chicken breast stuffed with mushrooms & herbs. 4 days & counting! http://t.co/EhnGPkj3se
A big thank you to @RedPebbleEvents for the amazing job they did theming our stand at #ShowMeWgtn! http://t.co/S03dlvDonB
Come & visit our lovely team at #ShowMeWgtn today. We are the first stand on your right as you enter the TSB Arena. http://t.co/ft6xnxreBs
@NewtownNZ Thanks for the RT! Was such a gorgeous morning. We couldn't help but take a snap :)
What a beautiful start to the day! #sunrise in Newtown, #Wellington. #WellingtonNZ http://t.co/dIfPDh1djG
